article_title: PlayStation 4 battles Xbox One in ads just in time for the holidays
article_text:
[media-credit name=”” align=”alignnone” width=”485″][/media-credit]

I admittedly first saw this angle on Cnet.com, but liked it enough to post something for our readers.

It is no secret the big holiday buzz is the anticipation of the new Sony PlayStation 4 squaring off against the new Xbox One from Microsoft.

Xbox One



There will be much debate over which will be king of the hill, but for entertainment’s sake, let’s limit this instance just to which has the better commercials.

I know which one I’d pick based on each video, but would like to pose the question: Which would you favor after watching both? Watch more below.

PlayStation 4



On a side note, what happened to Nintendo’s Wii U? I find it fascinating how silent they’ve been during all this hubbub.

og.description: PlayStation 4 vs. Xbox One: Who has the better commercial? Whatever happened to Wii U?
og.title: PlayStation 4 battles Xbox One in ads just in time for the holidays
